We our working with our healthcare client on their search for a Data Science Manager. This is a greenfield opportunity to help build their data science team from scratch. They are looking for a hands-on, results oriented leader that has full model development lifecycle experience.RESPONSIBILITIES:• Lead and grow the Data Science team.• Gather requirements from internal stakeholders and create models to support business decisions.• Serve as a subject matter expert for ML/AI.REQUIREMENTS:• 5+ years of relevant data science work experience.• Proven experience with machine learning techniques.• Knowledge of data engineering, predictive modeling, optimization, and NLP.• Full model development lifecycle experience.• Hands-on experience with Python or R, SQL, and BI Tools.• Prior experience working with healthcare data.This is a REMOTE opportunity. Targeting a base salary around $150K + 5% bonus.Keywords: machine learning, artificial intelligence, data, insights, governance, data scientist, decision science, clustering, decision tree, analytics, data engineering, predictive modeling, NLP, optimization, Excel, Python, R, SQL, tableau, Power BI, unstructured data, healthcare, Epic, visualization
